thread.title: Jeff Gordon leads Hendrick Motorsports charge at Talladega
thread.title_full: Jeff Gordon leads Hendrick Motorsports charge at Talladega

author: JENNA FRYER
title: Jeff Gordon leads Hendrick Motorsports charge at Talladega
text:
Mark Almond Jeff Gordon leads Hendrick Motorsports charge at Talladega 
Jeff Gordon (24) climbs out of his car after winning the pole during qualifying for the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series auto race at Talladega Superspeedway Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Talladega, Ala. (AP Photo/ Mark Almond) Mark Almond Jeff Gordon leads Hendrick Motorsports charge at Talladega 
Sprint Cup Series driver Jeff Gordon (24) waits by his car before making his second qualifying run for the NASCAR Sprint Cup Series auto race at Talladega Superspeedway Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015, in Talladega, Ala. (AP Photo/ Mark Almond ) Posted: Saturday, October 24, 2015 6:43 pm | Updated: 7:00 pm, Sat Oct 24, 2015. Jeff Gordon leads Hendrick Motorsports charge at Talladega Associated Press | 
TALLADEGA, Ala. (AP) — Jeff Gordon led a Hendrick Motorsports rout in qualifying Saturday to win the pole for his final race at Talladega Superspeedway. 
Gordon led teammates Kasey Kahne and Jimmie Johnson in a sweep of the top three starting spots for the race Sunday. Dale Earnhardt Jr. qualified fifth to put the four Hendrick drivers in the first three rows at the 2.66-mile supserpseedway.
